sourcesContent:
<template>
  <el-form :model="form" class="form" label-width="auto" style="max-width: 600px" v-if="isVisible">
    <el-form-item label="Name">
      <el-input v-model="form.name"></el-input>
    </el-form-item>
    <el-form-item label="Region">
      <el-input v-model="form.region"></el-input>
    </el-form-item>
    <el-form-item label="Date 1">
      <el-date-picker v-model="form.date1" type="date"></el-date-picker>
    </el-form-item>
    <el-form-item label="Date 2">
      <el-date-picker v-model="form.date2" type="date"></el-date-picker>
    </el-form-item>
    <el-form-item label="Delivery">
      <el-switch v-model="form.delivery"></el-switch>
    </el-form-item>
    <el-form-item label="Type">
      <el-checkbox-group v-model="form.type">
        <el-checkbox label="Type A"></el-checkbox>
        <el-checkbox label="Type B"></el-checkbox>
        <el-checkbox label="Type C"></el-checkbox>
      </el-checkbox-group>
    </el-form-item>
    <el-form-item label="Resource">
      <el-input v-model="form.resource"></el-input>
    </el-form-item>
    <el-form-item label="Description">
      <el-input type="textarea" v-model="form.desc"></el-input>
    </el-form-item>
  </el-form>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  name: 'PrescriptionDetails',
  data () {
    return {
      isVisible: false,
      form: {
        name: '',
        region: '',
        date1: '',
        date2: '',
        delivery: false,
        type: [],
        resource: '',
        desc: ''
      }
    }
  },
  methods: {
    openModal () {
      this.isVisible = true;
    }
  }

}
</script>

<style scoped>
/* 可以添加样式以调整表单的外观 */
</style>
